meanings.definition: A dish of meat, typically beef, cooked slowly in a covered pot with onions and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared delicious carbonades for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: My mom's carbonades are always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The carbonades in the pot were so fragrant that they attracted the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering carbonades filled the kitchen like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The tender carbonades melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste.

meanings.definition: A cut of meat suitable for stewing or braising.
meanings.sent1: The butcher recommended the carbonades for the beef stew.
meanings.sent2: I bought some high-quality carbonades for the slow cooker recipe.
meanings.sent3: The oversized carbonades made the stew pot look comically small.
meanings.sent4: The marbled carbonades resembled pieces of art in the butcher's display.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the braised carbonades was unmatched by any other cut of meat.
